items.title: Jim Cramer ‘Loves’ McDonald’s (MCD) Amid ‘Ironclad Story’ and ‘No Tariff’ Impact
items.description: We recently published a list of Top 10 Stocks to Watch Ahead of May. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) stands against other top stocks to watch ahead of May. Aswath Damodaran from NYU Stern School of Business said in a latest interview with CNBC that […]

items.title: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) Enhances Lobbying Disclosures Following Shareholder Feedback
items.description: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) recently enhanced its lobbying-related disclosures following shareholder feedback, reinforcing its commitment to investor engagement. A 10% price increase in the last quarter aligns closely with the market's upward momentum. During this period, the announcement of a new share repurchase program contributed additional weight to McDonald's positive performance, providing reassurance amid broader market trends. Although the company reported lower Q4 earnings compared to the...
